participant_1.background:
My hands were always greasy from working on cars.
I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
I love to play soccer in the park because it is a great way to stay active and connect with my friends.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

participant_2.background:
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.
i am a writer.
my wife has terminal cancer.
My new love is the one who got me over my fear of left turns.
I like listening to folk metal and riding my boat.

content.text: That's cool! What kind of things do you like to write?
I like to write folk metal songs and stories. I'm also working on a novel about a woman who has terminal cancer.
That sounds really interesting! I hope you're doing well.
Thanks, I'm hanging in there. It's been a tough year.
I'm sorry to hear that. What's something that you like to do to relax?
I like to ride my boat and listen to music. I also love watching my dog, Gila, chase the sunbeams around my living room.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been on a boat before.
It's a great way to relax and enjoy the outdoors. I love taking Gila for rides on the boat too.
He does! He's always so excited to go on the boat.
I'm glad to hear that you have something that you enjoy doing to relax.
I'm glad we had a chance to chat.
Me too! It was nice to meet you.
